description: We talk about the missions and rules at this year's Grand Narrative event - what they were, and how to play with them.
title: The Narrative Forge: The 2024 Grand Narrative Missions and Crusade Rules

description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- November 26th, 2024

description: Stephanie goes a-warring at Warfare 2024! Will she take the crown, or will she be the clown? Scroll down to... er... check her reknown!
title: All’s Fare In Love and Kings of War: Warfare 2024 Event Report

title: Conquest Fabricator General: Battlefields of Eä

description: The Wrecking Crew represents a new approach to character design in Marvel: Crisis Protocol. Instead of individual models, the four members of the Crew are joined together on a single large base. They work together as a single character, with various rules on the card representing each member. It’s a fun design, but what about […]
title: How to Paint Everything: The Wrecking Crew for Marvel: Crisis Protocol

description: In recent weeks a lot has happened in the ASOIAF:TMG from rules released on the War Council App, to big events taking place across Europe, and changes to the development of the main game and skirmish game. We will be covering all of these in this article. Fabio Curry Leaves the Development Team For many […]
title: ASOIAF Update: New Unit Rules, Developer Leaves, and Tournament Controversy
